definition.de: Ort, für die Inhaftierung aus Menschen aus unterschiedlichen Gründen
definition.dk: En institution, hvor kriminelle efter dom er frihedsberøvet.
definition.en-GB: Facility where people are held as a punishment for a crime they have committed or while awaiting trial
definition.en-US: Facility where people are held as a punishment for a crime they have committed or while awaiting trial
definition.pt-BR: Prisão, casa de detenção, presídio onde são encarcerados os infratores condenados pela justiça.
definition.pt-PT: Edificação onde são encarcerados os infratores condenados pela justiça.
definition.se: En påföljd som innebär att den som fällts blir inspärrad för en avgränsad tid, eller tills vidare.
definition.zh-Hans: 惩罚人们所犯的罪行或在等待审判时被关押的场所
